Urgent hospital management to limit the risk of complications

question.question: What is the primary goal of urgent hospital management in cases of septic arthritis?
question.option_a: To reduce the risk of bone fractures
question.option_b: To limit the risk of complications
question.option_c: To prevent the spread of infection to other joints
question.option_d: To manage chronic pain associated with the condition
